data.text:
BACHELOR OF ARTS

Compulsory subjects: English, MIL (Assamese/ Alternative English)

Optional Subjects: (any two): Political Science, Economics and Education

BACHELOR OF COMMERCE (General)

Master Degree Progammes:

(a) M.A. in English, (b) M.A. in Political Science,

(c) M.A. in Education, (d) M.A. in Economics,

(e) M.A. in Assamese, (f) M.A./M.Sc. in Mathematics.

PG Diploma programme:

Post Graduate Diploma in Journalism and Mass Communication (PGDJMC)

Limited intake capacity of the college and economic compulsion of many aspirants for higher education has kept a large section of students outside the domain of University education. In the backdrop of this, with a view to offer a plat form for the higher education aspirants of the catchment area, Digboi College has introduced the following programmes of Distance Mode of Study under Dibrugarh University from the session 2012-13.
